xmlparse.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !===============================================================================
00002 ! XMLPARSE - Simple, limited XML parser in Fortran
00003 !
00004 ! General information:
00005 ! The module reads XML files by:
00006 ! - Identifying the tag and all attributes and data belonging
00007 !   to the tag.
00008 ! - Returning to the calling subprogram to let it take care of
00009 !   the tag, attributes and data.
00010 ! - If the tag is actually an ending tag, then this is flagged
00011 !   too.
00012 ! - Handling all the data is left to the calling subprogram,
00013 !   the module merely facilitates in the parsing.
00014 !
00015 ! Note:
00016 ! The module in its current version has a number of limitations:
00017 ! - It does not handle escape sequences (like &gt. to signify
00018 !   a ">" sign)
00019 ! - It does not handle tags with attributes that are spread
00020 !   over more than one line
00021 ! - The maximum length of a line is 1000 characters
00022 ! - It may report too many lines of data (empty lines)
00023 ! - No DOM support nor support for an object tree
00024 ! - It is probably not very robust in detecting malformed XML files
00025 !
00026 ! Some questions:
00027 ! - What to do with leading blanks?
00028 !
00029 ! Update - several ideas:
00030 ! - Introduce at least two options (via xml_options):
00031 !   - ignore_whitespace  - remove leading blanks and leading and trailing
00032 !                          empty lines from the PCDATA
00033 !   - no_data_truncation - consider truncation of data (more
00034 !                          attributes or lines of character data than
00035 !                          can be stored) a read error
00036 ! - Introduce convenience functions and subroutines:
00037 !   - xml_ok()           - all is well, reading can continue
00038 !   - xml_data_trunc()   - was there truncation of the data?
00039 !   - xml_find_attrib()  - find an attribute by name
00040 !
00041 ! Further ideas:
00042 !   - simple checking via a table: parent, tag, id, min, max
00043 !===============================================================================
00044 
00045 module xmlparse
00046 
00047    implicit none
00048 
00049    integer, parameter :: XML_BUFFER_LENGTH = 10000
00050 
00051 !===============================================================================
00052 ! XML_PARSE defines the data type that holds the parser information
00053 !===============================================================================
00054 
00055    type XML_PARSE
00056       integer          :: lun                ! LU-number of the XML-file
00057       integer          :: level              ! Indentation level (output)
00058       integer          :: lineno             ! Line in file
00059       logical          :: ignore_whitespace  ! Ignore leading blanks etc.
00060       logical          :: no_data_truncation ! Do not allow data truncation
00061       logical          :: too_many_attribs   ! More attributes than could be stored?
00062       logical          :: too_many_data      ! More lines of data than could be stored?
00063       logical          :: eof                ! End of file?
00064       logical          :: error              ! Invalid XML file or other error?
00065       character(len=XML_BUFFER_LENGTH) :: line  ! Buffer
00066    end type XML_PARSE
00067 
00068 !===============================================================================
00069 ! Global options
00070 !===============================================================================
00071 
00072    integer, parameter    :: XML_STDOUT       = -1
00073    integer, private      :: report_lun_      = XML_STDOUT
00074    logical, private      :: report_errors_   = .false.
00075    logical, private      :: report_details_  = .false.
00076 
00077 !===============================================================================
00078 ! Global data (the ampersand must come first)
00079 !===============================================================================
00080 
00081    character(len=10), dimension(2,3), save, private :: entities = 
00082       reshape( (/ '&    ', '&amp;', 
00083                   '>    ', '&gt; ',  
00084                   '<    ', '&lt; ' /), (/2,3/) )
00085 
00086 !===============================================================================
00087 ! Auxiliary routines - private
00088 !===============================================================================
00089 
00090    private               :: xml_compress_
00091    private               :: xml_put_open_tag_
00092    private               :: xml_put_element_
00093    private               :: xml_put_close_tag_
00094    private               :: xml_replace_entities_
00095    private               :: xml_remove_tabs_
00096 
00097 !===============================================================================
00098 ! Interfaces to reporting routines
00099 !===============================================================================
00100 
00101    private               :: xml_report_details_int_
00102    private               :: xml_report_details_string_
00103    private               :: xml_report_errors_int_
00104    private               :: xml_report_errors_string_
00105 
00106    interface xml_report_details
00107       module procedure xml_report_details_int_
00108       module procedure xml_report_details_string_
00109    end interface
00110    interface xml_report_errors
00111       module procedure xml_report_errors_int_
00112       module procedure xml_report_errors_string_
00113       module procedure xml_report_errors_extern_
00114    end interface
00115 
00116 contains
00117 
00118 !===============================================================================
00119 ! XML_REPORT_DETAILS_INT_ --
00120 !    Routine to write a text with an integer value
00121 ! Arguments:
00122 !    text        Text to be written
00123 !    int         Integer value to be added
00124 !===============================================================================
00125 
00126 subroutine xml_report_details_int_( text, int )
00127    character(len=*), intent(in)     :: text
00128    integer,          intent(in)     :: int
00129 
00130    if ( report_details_ ) then
00131       if ( report_lun_ == XML_STDOUT ) then
00132          write(*,*) trim(text), int
00133       else
00134          write(report_lun_,*) trim(text), int
00135       endif
00136    endif
00137 end subroutine xml_report_details_int_
00138 
00139 !===============================================================================
00140 ! XML_REPORT_DETAILS_STRING_ --
00141 !    Routine to write a text with a string value
00142 ! Arguments:
00143 !    text        Text to be written
00144 !    string      String to be added
00145 !===============================================================================
00146 
00147 subroutine xml_report_details_string_( text, string )
00148    character(len=*), intent(in)     :: text
00149    character(len=*), intent(in)     :: string
00150 
00151    if ( report_details_ ) then
00152       if ( report_lun_ == XML_STDOUT ) then
00153          write(*,*) trim(text), ' ', trim(string)
00154       else
00155          write(report_lun_,*) trim(text), ' ', trim(string)
00156       endif
00157    endif
00158 end subroutine xml_report_details_string_
00159 
00160 !===============================================================================
00161 ! XML_REPORT_ERRORS_INT_ --
00162 !    Routine to write an error message text with an integer value
00163 ! Arguments:
00164 !    text        Text to be written
00165 !    int         Integer value to be added
00166 !    lineno      Line number in the file
00167 !===============================================================================
00168 
00169 subroutine xml_report_errors_int_( text, int, lineno )
00170    character(len=*),  intent(in)     :: text
00171    integer,           intent(in)     :: int
00172    integer, optional, intent(in)     :: lineno
00173 
00174    if ( report_errors_ .or. report_details_ ) then
00175       if ( report_lun_ == XML_STDOUT ) then
00176          write(*,*) trim(text), int
00177          if ( present(lineno) ) then
00178             write(*,*) '   At or near line', lineno
00179          endif
00180       else
00181          write(report_lun_,*) trim(text), int
00182          if ( present(lineno) ) then
00183             write(report_lun_,*) '   At or near line', lineno
00184          endif
00185       endif
00186    endif
00187 end subroutine xml_report_errors_int_
00188 
00189 !===============================================================================
00190 ! XML_REPORT_ERRORS_STRING_ --
00191 !    Routine to write an error message text with a string value
00192 ! Arguments:
00193 !    text        Text to be written
00194 !    string      String to be added
00195 !    lineno      Line number in the file
00196 !===============================================================================
00197 
00198 subroutine xml_report_errors_string_( text, string, lineno )
00199    character(len=*),  intent(in)     :: text
00200    character(len=*),  intent(in)     :: string
00201    integer, optional, intent(in)     :: lineno
00202 
00203    if ( report_errors_ .or. report_details_ ) then
00204       if ( report_lun_ == XML_STDOUT ) then
00205          write(*,*) trim(text), ' ', trim(string)
00206          if ( present(lineno) ) then
00207             write(*,*) '   At or near line', lineno
00208          endif
00209       else
00210          write(report_lun_,*) trim(text), ' ', trim(string)
00211          if ( present(lineno) ) then
00212             write(report_lun_,*) '   At or near line', lineno
00213          endif
00214       endif
00215    endif
00216 end subroutine xml_report_errors_string_
00217 
00218 !===============================================================================
00219 ! XML_REPORT_ERRORS_EXTERN_ --
00220 !    Routine to write an error message text with a string value
00221 ! Arguments:
00222 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00223 !    text        Text to be written
00224 ! Note:
00225 !    This routine is meant for use by routines outside
00226 !    this module
00227 !===============================================================================
00228 
00229 subroutine xml_report_errors_extern_( info, text )
00230    type(XML_PARSE),   intent(in)     :: info
00231    character(len=*),  intent(in)     :: text
00232 
00233    if ( report_errors_ .or. report_details_ ) then
00234       if ( report_lun_ == XML_STDOUT ) then
00235          write(*,*) trim(text), ' - at or near line', info%lineno
00236       else
00237          write(report_lun_,*) trim(text), ' - at or near line', info%lineno
00238       endif
00239    end if
00240 
00241 end subroutine xml_report_errors_extern_
00242 
00243 !===============================================================================
00244 ! XML_OPEN --
00245 !    Routine to open an XML file for reading or writing
00246 ! Arguments:
00247 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00248 !    fname       Name of the file
00249 !    mustread    The file will be read (.true.) or written (.false.)
00250 !===============================================================================
00251 
00252 subroutine xml_open( info, fname, mustread )
00253    character(len=*), intent(in)     :: fname
00254    logical,          intent(in)     :: mustread
00255    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(out)    :: info
00256 
00257    integer                          :: i
00258    integer                          :: k
00259    integer                          :: kend
00260    integer                          :: ierr
00261    logical                          :: opend
00262    logical                          :: exists
00263 
00264    info%lun = 10
00265    info%ignore_whitespace  = .false.
00266    info%no_data_truncation = .false.
00267    info%too_many_attribs   = .false.
00268    info%too_many_data      = .false.
00269    info%eof                = .false.
00270    info%error              = .false.
00271    info%level              = -1
00272    info%lineno             =  0
00273 
00274    do i = 10,99
00275       inquire( unit = i, opened = opend )
00276       if ( .not. opend ) then
00277          info%lun = i
00278          inquire( file = fname, exist = exists )
00279          if ( .not. exists .and. mustread ) then
00280             call xml_report_errors( 'XML_OPEN: file does not exist:', trim(fname))
00281             info%lun   = -1
00282             info%error = .true.
00283          else
00284             open( unit = info%lun, file = fname )
00285             call xml_report_details( 'XML_OPEN: opened file ', trim(fname) )
00286             call xml_report_details( 'at LU-number: ', info%lun )
00287          endif
00288          exit
00289       endif
00290    enddo
00291    if ( .not. info%error .and. mustread ) then
00292       k = 1
00293       do while ( k >= 1 )
00294          read( info%lun, '(a)', iostat = ierr ) info%line
00295          call xml_remove_tabs_(info%line)
00296          if ( ierr == 0 ) then
00297             info%line = adjustl(  info%line )
00298             k         = index( info%line, '<?' )
00299             !
00300             ! Assume (for now at least) that <?xml ... ?> appears on a single line!
00301             !
00302             if ( k >= 1 ) then
00303                kend = index( info%line, '?>' )
00304                if ( kend <= 0 ) then
00305                   call xml_report_errors( 'XML_OPEN: error reading file with LU-number: ', info%lun )
00306                   call xml_report_errors( 'Line starting with "<?xml" should end with "?>"', ' ' )
00307                   info%error = .true.
00308                   exit
00309                endif
00310             endif
00311          else
00312             call xml_report_errors( 'XML_OPEN: error reading file with LU-number: ', info%lun )
00313             call xml_report_errors( 'Possibly no line starting with "<?xml"', ' ' )
00314             call xml_close( info )
00315             info%error = .true.
00316             exit
00317          endif
00318       enddo
00319    endif
00320    if ( .not. info%error .and. .not. mustread ) then
00321        write( info%lun, '(a)' ) '<?xml version="1.0"?>'
00322    endif
00323 end subroutine xml_open
00324 
00325 !===============================================================================
00326 ! XML_CLOSE --
00327 !    Routine to close an XML file
00328 ! Arguments:
00329 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00330 !===============================================================================
00331 
00332 subroutine xml_close( info )
00333    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)    :: info
00334 
00335    close( info%lun )
00336 
00337    !
00338    ! Only clean up the LU-number, so that the calling program
00339    ! can examine the last condition
00340    !
00341    call xml_report_details( 'XML_CLOSE: Closing file with LU-number ', info%lun )
00342    info%lun              = -1
00343 end subroutine xml_close
00344 
00345 !===============================================================================
00346 ! XML_GET --
00347 !    Routine to get the next bit of information from an XML file
00348 ! Arguments:
00349 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00350 !    tag         Tag that was encountered
00351 !    endtag      Whether the end of the element was encountered
00352 !    attribs     List of attribute-value pairs
00353 !    no_attribs  Number of pairs in the list
00354 !    data        Lines of character data found
00355 !    no_data     Number of lines of character data
00356 !===============================================================================
00357 
00358 subroutine xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, no_attribs, &
00359                    data, no_data )
00360    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)               :: info
00361    character(len=*), intent(out)                 :: tag
00362    logical,          intent(out)                 :: endtag
00363    character(len=*), intent(out), dimension(:,:) :: attribs
00364    integer,          intent(out)                 :: no_attribs
00365    character(len=*), intent(out), dimension(:)   :: data
00366    integer,          intent(out)                 :: no_data
00367 
00368    integer         :: kspace
00369    integer         :: kend
00370    integer         :: keq
00371    integer         :: kfirst
00372    integer         :: ksecond
00373    integer         :: idxat
00374    integer         :: idxdat
00375    integer         :: ierr
00376    logical         :: close_bracket
00377    logical         :: comment_tag
00378    character(len=XML_BUFFER_LENGTH) :: nextline
00379 
00380    !
00381    ! Initialise the output
00382    !
00383    endtag     = .false.
00384    no_attribs = 0
00385    no_data    = 0
00386 
00387    info%too_many_attribs = .false.
00388    info%too_many_data    = .false.
00389 
00390    if ( info%lun < 0 ) then
00391       call xml_report_details( 'XML_GET on closed file ', ' ' )
00392       return
00393    endif
00394 
00395    !
00396    ! From the previous call or the call to xmlopen we have
00397    ! the line that we need to parse already in memory:
00398    ! <tag attrib1="..." attrib2="..." />
00399    !
00400    comment_tag   = .false.
00401    close_bracket = .false.
00402    kspace        = index( info%line, ' ' )
00403    kend          = index( info%line, '>' )
00404    do while ( kend <= 0 )
00405       read( info%lun, '(a)', iostat = ierr ) nextline
00406       call xml_remove_tabs_(nextline)
00407       info%lineno = info%lineno + 1
00408 
00409       if ( ierr == 0 ) then
00410          info%line = trim(info%line) // ' ' // adjustl(nextline)
00411       else
00412          info%error = .true.
00413          call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - end of tag not found ', &
00414                  '(buffer too small?)', info%lineno )
00415          call xml_close( info )
00416          return
00417       endif
00418       kend = index( info%line, '>' )
00419    enddo
00420    if ( kend > kspace ) then
00421       kend = kspace
00422    else
00423       close_bracket = .true.
00424    endif
00425 
00426    !
00427    ! Check for the end of an ordianry tag and of
00428    ! a comment tag
00429    !
00430    if ( info%line(1:3) == '-->' ) then
00431       endtag = .true.
00432       tag    = info%line(4:kend-1)
00433    else if ( info%line(1:2) == '</' ) then
00434       endtag = .true.
00435       tag    = info%line(3:kend-1)
00436    else
00437       if ( info%line(1:1) == '<' ) then
00438          tag    = info%line(2:kend-1)
00439          call xml_report_details( 'XML_GET - tag found: ', trim(tag) )
00440       else
00441          kend   = 0 ! Beginning of data!
00442       endif
00443    endif
00444 
00445    info%line = adjustl( info%line(kend+1:) )
00446 
00447    idxat     = 0
00448    idxdat    = 0
00449 
00450    if ( tag(1:3) == '!--' ) comment_tag = .true.
00451 
00452    do while ( info%line /= ' ' .and. .not. close_bracket .and. .not. comment_tag )
00453 
00454       keq  = index( info%line, '=' )
00455       kend = index( info%line, '>' )
00456       if ( keq > kend ) keq = 0 ! Guard against multiple tags
00457                                    ! with attributes on one line
00458 
00459       !
00460       ! No attributes any more?
00461       !
00462       if ( keq < 1 ) then
00463          kend = index( info%line, '/>' )
00464          if ( kend >= 1 ) then
00465             kend   = kend + 1 ! To go beyond the ">" character
00466             endtag = .true.
00467          else
00468             kend = index( info%line, '>' )
00469             if ( kend < 1 ) then
00470                call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - wrong ending of tag ', &
00471                        trim(info%line), info%lineno  )
00472                info%error = .true. ! Wrong ending of line!
00473                call xml_close( info )
00474                return
00475             else
00476                close_bracket = .true.
00477             endif
00478          endif
00479          if ( kend >= 1 ) then
00480             info%line = adjustl( info%line(kend+1:) )
00481          endif
00482          exit
00483       endif
00484 
00485       idxat = idxat + 1
00486       if ( idxat <= size(attribs,2) ) then
00487          no_attribs = idxat
00488          attribs(1,idxat) = adjustl(info%line(1:keq-1)) ! Use adjustl() to avoid
00489                                                         ! multiple spaces, etc
00490          info%line = adjustl( info%line(keq+1:) )
00491 
00492          !
00493          ! We have almost found the start of the attribute's value
00494          !
00495          kfirst  = index( info%line, '"' )
00496          if ( kfirst < 1 ) then
00497             call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - malformed attribute-value pair: ', &
00498                     trim(info%line), info%lineno  )
00499             info%error = .true. ! Wrong form of attribute-value pair
00500             call xml_close( info )
00501             return
00502          endif
00503 
00504          ksecond = index( info%line(kfirst+1:), '"' ) + kfirst
00505          if ( ksecond < 1 ) then
00506             call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - malformed attribute-value pair: ', &
00507                     trim(info%line), info%lineno  )
00508             info%error = .true. ! Wrong form of attribute-value pair
00509             call xml_close( info )
00510             return
00511          endif
00512 
00513          attribs(2,idxat) = info%line(kfirst+1:ksecond-1)
00514          info%line = adjustl( info%line(ksecond+1:) )
00515       endif
00516 
00517       if ( idxat > size(attribs,2) ) then
00518          call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - more attributes than could be stored: ', &
00519                  trim(info%line), info%lineno  )
00520          info%too_many_attribs = .true.
00521          info%line             = ' '
00522          exit
00523       endif
00524    enddo
00525 
00526    !
00527    ! Now read the data associated with the current tag
00528    ! - all the way to the next "<" character
00529    !
00530    ! To do: reduce the number of data lines - empty ones
00531    ! at the end should not count.
00532    !
00533    do
00534       if ( comment_tag ) then
00535          kend   = index( info%line, '-->' )
00536       else
00537          kend   = index( info%line, '<' )
00538       endif
00539       idxdat = idxdat + 1
00540       if ( idxdat <= size(data) ) then
00541          no_data = idxdat
00542          if ( kend >= 1 ) then
00543             data(idxdat) = info%line(1:kend-1)
00544             info%line    = info%line(kend:)
00545          else
00546             data(idxdat) = info%line
00547          endif
00548       else
00549          call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - more data lines than could be stored: ', &
00550                  trim(info%line), info%lineno  )
00551          info%too_many_data = .true.
00552          exit
00553       endif
00554 
00555       !
00556       ! No more data? Otherwise, read on
00557       !
00558       if ( kend >= 1 ) then
00559          exit
00560       else
00561          read( info%lun, '(a)', iostat = ierr ) info%line
00562          call xml_remove_tabs_(info%line)
00563          info%lineno = info%lineno + 1
00564 
00565          if ( ierr < 0 ) then
00566             call xml_report_details( 'XML_GET - end of file found - LU-number: ', &
00567                     info%lun )
00568             info%eof = .true.
00569          elseif ( ierr > 0 ) then
00570             call xml_report_errors( 'XML_GET - error reading file with LU-number ', &
00571                     info%lun, info%lineno  )
00572             info%error = .true.
00573          endif
00574          if ( ierr /= 0 ) then
00575             exit
00576          endif
00577       endif
00578    enddo
00579 
00580    !
00581    ! Compress the data?
00582    !
00583    if ( info%ignore_whitespace ) then
00584       call xml_compress_( data, no_data )
00585    endif
00586 
00587    !
00588    ! Replace the entities, if any
00589    !
00590    call xml_replace_entities_( data, no_data )
00591 
00592    call xml_report_details( 'XML_GET - number of attributes: ', no_attribs )
00593    call xml_report_details( 'XML_GET - number of data lines: ', no_data    )
00594 
00595 end subroutine xml_get
00596 
00597 !===============================================================================
00598 ! XML_PUT --
00599 !    Routine to write a tag with the associated data to an XML file
00600 ! Arguments:
00601 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00602 !    tag         Tag that was encountered
00603 !    endtag      Whether the end of the element was encountered
00604 !    attribs     List of attribute-value pairs
00605 !    no_attribs  Number of pairs in the list
00606 !    data        Lines of character data found
00607 !    no_data     Number of lines of character data
00608 !    type        Type of action:
00609 !                open - just the opening tag with attributes
00610 !                elem - complete element
00611 !                close - just the closing tag
00612 !===============================================================================
00613 
00614 subroutine xml_put(info, tag, attribs, no_attribs, &
00615                    data, no_data, type)
00616 
00617    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)               :: info
00618    character(len=*), intent(in)                  :: tag
00619    character(len=*), intent(in), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00620    integer,          intent(in)                  :: no_attribs
00621    character(len=*), intent(in), dimension(:)    :: data
00622    integer,          intent(in)                  :: no_data
00623    character(len=*)                              :: type
00624 
00625    select case(type)
00626       case('open')
00627          call xml_put_open_tag_(info, tag, attribs, no_attribs)
00628       case('elem')
00629          call xml_put_element_(info, tag, attribs, no_attribs, &
00630                   data, no_data)
00631       case('close')
00632          call xml_put_close_tag_(info, tag)
00633    end select
00634 
00635 end subroutine xml_put
00636 
00637 !===============================================================================
00638 ! XML_PUT_OPEN_TAG_ --
00639 !    Routine to write the opening tag with the attributes
00640 ! Arguments:
00641 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00642 !    tag         Tag that was encountered
00643 !    endtag      Whether the end of the element was encountered
00644 !    attribs     List of attribute-value pairs
00645 !    no_attribs  Number of pairs in the list
00646 !    data        Lines of character data found
00647 !    no_data     Number of lines of character data
00648 !===============================================================================
00649 
00650 subroutine xml_put_open_tag_(info, tag, attribs, no_attribs)
00651 
00652    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)               :: info
00653    character(len=*), intent(in)                  :: tag
00654    character(len=*), intent(in), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00655    integer,          intent(in)                  :: no_attribs
00656 
00657    integer         :: i
00658    character(len=300), parameter :: indent = ' '
00659 
00660    write( info%lun, '(3a)', advance = 'no' ) &
00661          indent(1:3*info%level), '<', adjustl(tag)
00662    do i=1,no_attribs
00663       if (attribs(2,i)/='') then
00664          write( info%lun, '(5a)', advance = 'no' ) &
00665             ' ',trim(attribs(1,i)),'="', trim(attribs(2,i)),'"'
00666       endif
00667    enddo
00668    write( info%lun, '(a)' ) '>'
00669    info%level = info%level + 1
00670 
00671 end subroutine xml_put_open_tag_
00672 
00673 !===============================================================================
00674 ! XML_PUT_ELEMENT_ --
00675 !    Routine to write the complete element
00676 ! Arguments:
00677 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00678 !    tag         Tag that was encountered
00679 !    endtag      Whether the end of the element was encountered
00680 !    attribs     List of attribute-value pairs
00681 !    no_attribs  Number of pairs in the list
00682 !    data        Lines of character data found
00683 !    no_data     Number of lines of character data
00684 !===============================================================================
00685 
00686 subroutine xml_put_element_(info, tag, attribs, no_attribs, &
00687                             data, no_data)
00688 
00689    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)               :: info
00690    character(len=*), intent(in)                  :: tag
00691    character(len=*), intent(in), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00692    integer,          intent(in)                  :: no_attribs
00693    character(len=*), intent(in), dimension(:)    :: data
00694    integer,          intent(in)                  :: no_data
00695 
00696    logical          :: logic
00697    character(len=1) :: aa
00698    integer          :: i, ii
00699 
00700    character(len=300), parameter :: indent = ' '
00701 
00702    if ( (no_attribs==0 .and. no_data==0) ) then
00703       return
00704    else
00705       logic = .true.
00706       do ii = 1,no_attribs
00707          logic = logic .and. (attribs(2,ii)=='')
00708       enddo
00709       do ii = 1,no_data
00710          logic = logic .and. (data(ii)=='')
00711       enddo
00712       if ( logic ) then
00713          return
00714       else
00715          write( info%lun, '(3a)', advance = 'no' ) &
00716              indent(1:3*info%level), '<', adjustl(tag)
00717          do i = 1,no_attribs
00718             if (attribs(2,i)/='') then
00719                write( info%lun, '(5a)', advance = 'no' ) &
00720                    ' ',trim(attribs(1,i)),'="', trim(attribs(2,i)),'"'
00721             endif
00722          enddo
00723          if ( no_attribs>0 .and. no_data==0 ) then
00724             aa='a'
00725          elseif ( (no_attribs>0 .and. no_data>0) .or. &
00726                   (no_attribs==0 .and. no_data>0) ) then
00727             aa='b'
00728          else
00729             write(*,*) no_attribs, no_data
00730          endif
00731       endif
00732    endif
00733 
00734    select case(aa)
00735    case('a')
00736       write( info%lun, '(a)' ) '/>'
00737    case('b')
00738       write( info%lun, '(a)',advance='no' ) '>'
00739       write( info%lun, '(2a)', advance='no') ( ' ', trim(data(i)), i=1,no_data )
00740       write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) ' ','</', tag, '>'
00741    end select
00742 
00743 end subroutine xml_put_element_
00744 
00745 !===============================================================================
00746 ! XML_PUT_CLOSE_TAG_ --
00747 !    Routine to write the closing tag
00748 ! Arguments:
00749 !    info        Structure holding information on the XML-file
00750 !    tag         Tag that was encountered
00751 !    endtag      Whether the end of the element was encountered
00752 !    attribs     List of attribute-value pairs
00753 !    no_attribs  Number of pairs in the list
00754 !    data        Lines of character data found
00755 !    no_data     Number of lines of character data
00756 !===============================================================================
00757 
00758 subroutine xml_put_close_tag_(info, tag)
00759 
00760    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout) :: info
00761    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: tag
00762 
00763    character(len=300), parameter :: indent = ' '
00764 
00765    info%level = info%level - 1
00766    write(info%lun, '(4a)') indent(1:3*info%level), '</', adjustl(tag), '>'
00767 
00768 end subroutine xml_put_close_tag_
00769 
00770 !===============================================================================
00771 ! XML_COMPRESS_ --
00772 !    Routine to remove empty lines from the character data
00773 ! Arguments:
00774 !    data        Lines of character data found
00775 !    no_data     (Nett) number of lines of character data
00776 !===============================================================================
00777 
00778 subroutine xml_compress_( data, no_data )
00779    character(len=*), intent(inout), dimension(:)    :: data
00780    integer,          intent(inout)                  :: no_data
00781 
00782    integer :: i
00783    integer :: j
00784    logical :: empty
00785 
00786    j     = 0
00787    empty = .true.
00788    do i = 1,no_data
00789       if ( len_trim(data(i)) /= 0 .or. .not. empty ) then
00790          j       = j + 1
00791          data(j) = adjustl(data(i))
00792          empty = .false.
00793       endif
00794    enddo
00795 
00796    no_data = j
00797 
00798    do i = no_data,1,-1
00799       if ( len_trim(data(i)) /= 0 ) then
00800          exit
00801       else
00802          no_data = no_data - 1
00803       endif
00804    enddo
00805 
00806 end subroutine xml_compress_
00807 
00808 !===============================================================================
00809 ! XML_REPLACE_ENTITIES_ --
00810 !    Routine to replace entities such as &gt; by their
00811 !    proper character representation
00812 ! Arguments:
00813 !    data        Lines of character data found
00814 !    no_data     (Nett) number of lines of character data
00815 !===============================================================================
00816 
00817 subroutine xml_replace_entities_( data, no_data )
00818    character(len=*), intent(inout), dimension(:)    :: data
00819    integer,          intent(inout)                  :: no_data
00820 
00821    integer :: i
00822    integer :: j
00823    integer :: j2
00824    integer :: k
00825    integer :: pos
00826    logical :: found
00827 
00828    do i = 1,no_data
00829       j = 1
00830       do
00831          do k = 1,size(entities,2)
00832             found = .false.
00833             pos   = index( data(i)(j:), trim(entities(2,k)) )
00834             if ( pos > 0 ) then
00835                found = .true.
00836                j     = j + pos - 1
00837                j2    = j + len_trim(entities(2,k))
00838                data(i)(j:) = trim(entities(1,k)) // data(i)(j2:)
00839                j     = j2
00840             endif
00841          enddo
00842          if ( .not. found ) exit
00843       enddo
00844    enddo
00845 
00846 end subroutine xml_replace_entities_
00847 
00848 !===============================================================================
00849 ! XML_OPTIONS --
00850 !    Routine to handle the parser options
00851 ! Arguments:
00852 !    info                Structure holding information on the XML-file
00853 !    ignore_whitespace   Ignore whitespace (leading blanks, empty lines) or not
00854 !    no_data_truncation  Consider truncation of strings an error or not
00855 !    report_lun          LU-number for reporting information
00856 !    report_errors       Write messages about errors or not
00857 !    report_details      Write messages about all kinds of actions or not
00858 !===============================================================================
00859 
00860 subroutine xml_options( info, ignore_whitespace, no_data_truncation, &
00861                         report_lun, report_errors, &
00862                         report_details )
00863    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(inout)               :: info
00864    logical, intent(in), optional                 :: ignore_whitespace
00865    logical, intent(in), optional                 :: no_data_truncation
00866 
00867    integer, intent(in), optional                 :: report_lun
00868    logical, intent(in), optional                 :: report_errors
00869    logical, intent(in), optional                 :: report_details
00870 
00871    if ( present(ignore_whitespace) ) then
00872       info%ignore_whitespace = ignore_whitespace
00873    endif
00874    if ( present(no_data_truncation) ) then
00875       info%no_data_truncation = no_data_truncation
00876    endif
00877    if ( present(report_lun) ) then
00878       report_lun_ = report_lun
00879    endif
00880    if ( present(report_errors) ) then
00881       report_errors_ = report_errors
00882    endif
00883    if ( present(report_details) ) then
00884       report_details_ = report_details
00885    endif
00886 end subroutine xml_options
00887 
00888 !===============================================================================
00889 ! XML_OK --
00890 !    Function that returns whether all was okay or not
00891 ! Arguments:
00892 !    info                Structure holding information on the XML-file
00893 ! Returns:
00894 !    .true. if there was no error, .false. otherwise
00895 !===============================================================================
00896 
00897 logical function xml_ok( info )
00898    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(in)               :: info
00899 
00900    xml_ok = info%eof .or. info%error .or. &
00901             ( info%no_data_truncation .and.    &
00902                  ( info%too_many_attribs .or. info%too_many_data ) )
00903    xml_ok = .not. xml_ok
00904 end function xml_ok
00905 
00906 !===============================================================================
00907 ! XML_ERROR --
00908 !    Function that returns whether there was an error
00909 ! Arguments:
00910 !    info                Structure holding information on the XML-file
00911 ! Returns:
00912 !    .true. if there was an error, .false. if there was none
00913 !===============================================================================
00914 
00915 logical function xml_error( info )
00916    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(in)               :: info
00917 
00918    xml_error = info%error .or. &
00919             ( info%no_data_truncation .and.    &
00920                  ( info%too_many_attribs .or. info%too_many_data ) )
00921 end function xml_error
00922 
00923 !===============================================================================
00924 ! XML_DATA_TRUNC --
00925 !    Function that returns whether data were truncated or not
00926 ! Arguments:
00927 !    info                Structure holding information on the XML-file
00928 ! Returns:
00929 !    .true. if data were truncated, .false. otherwise
00930 !===============================================================================
00931 
00932 logical function xml_data_trunc( info )
00933    type(XML_PARSE),  intent(in)               :: info
00934 
00935    xml_data_trunc = info%too_many_attribs .or. info%too_many_data
00936 end function xml_data_trunc
00937 
00938 !===============================================================================
00939 ! XML_FIND_ATTRIB
00940 !===============================================================================
00941 
00942 integer function xml_find_attrib( attribs, no_attribs, name, value )
00943    character(len=*), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00944    integer                           :: no_attribs
00945    character(len=*)                  :: name
00946    character(len=*)                  :: value
00947 
00948    integer :: i
00949 
00950    xml_find_attrib = -1
00951    do i = 1,no_attribs
00952       if ( name == attribs(1,i) ) then
00953          value           = attribs(2,i)
00954          xml_find_attrib = i
00955          exit
00956       endif
00957    enddo
00958 
00959 end function xml_find_attrib
00960 
00961 !===============================================================================
00962 ! XML_PROCESS --
00963 !    Routine to read the XML file as a whole and distribute processing
00964 !    the contents over three user-defined subroutines
00965 ! Arguments:
00966 !    filename            Name of the file to process
00967 !    attribs             Array for holding the attributes
00968 !    data                Array for holding the character data
00969 !    startfunc           Subroutine to handle the start of elements
00970 !    datafunc            Subroutine to handle the character data
00971 !    endfunc             Subroutine to handle the end of elements
00972 !    error               Indicates if there was an error or not
00973 ! Note:
00974 !    The routine is declared recursive to allow inclusion of XML files
00975 !    (common with XSD schemas). This extends to the auxiliary routines.
00976 !===============================================================================
00977 
00978 recursive &
00979 subroutine xml_process( filename, attribs, data, startfunc, datafunc, endfunc, lunrep, error )
00980    character(len=*)                  :: filename
00981    character(len=*), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00982    character(len=*), dimension(:)    :: data
00983    integer                           :: lunrep
00984    logical                           :: error
00985 
00986    interface
00987       recursive subroutine startfunc( tag, attribs, error )
00988          character(len=*)                  :: tag
00989          character(len=*), dimension(:,:)  :: attribs
00990          logical                           :: error
00991       end subroutine
00992    end interface
00993 
00994    interface
00995       recursive subroutine datafunc( tag, data, error )
00996          character(len=*)                  :: tag
00997          character(len=*), dimension(:)    :: data
00998          logical                           :: error
00999       end subroutine
01000    end interface
01001 
01002    interface
01003       recursive subroutine endfunc( tag, error )
01004          character(len=*)                  :: tag
01005          logical                           :: error
01006       end subroutine
01007    end interface
01008 
01009    type(XML_PARSE)                               :: info
01010    character(len=80)                             :: tag
01011    logical                                       :: endtag
01012    integer                                       :: noattribs
01013    integer                                       :: nodata
01014 
01015    call xml_options( info, report_lun = lunrep, report_details = .false. )
01016    call xml_open( info, filename, .true. )
01017 
01018    error = .false.
01019    do
01020       call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
01021       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) then
01022          exit
01023       endif
01024 
01025       if ( xml_error(info) ) then
01026          write(lunrep,*) 'Error reading XML file!'
01027          error = .true.
01028          exit
01029       endif
01030 
01031       if ( .not. endtag .or. noattribs /= 0 ) then
01032          call startfunc( tag, attribs(:,1:noattribs), error )
01033          if ( error ) exit
01034 
01035          call datafunc( tag, data(1:nodata), error )
01036          if ( error ) exit
01037       endif
01038 
01039       if ( endtag ) then
01040          call endfunc( tag, error )
01041          if ( error ) exit
01042       endif
01043    enddo
01044    call xml_close( info )
01045 end subroutine xml_process
01046 
01047 !===============================================================================
01048 ! XML_REMOVE_TABS_ --
01049 !    Routine to change any horizontal tab characters to spaces when reading a
01050 !    new line of data
01051 ! Arguments:
01052 !    line        Line of character data to modify
01053 !===============================================================================
01054 
01055 subroutine xml_remove_tabs_(line)
01056   character(len=*), intent(inout) :: line
01057 
01058   integer :: i
01059 
01060   do i = 1, len_trim(line)
01061      if (line(i:i) == achar(9)) then
01062         line(i:i) = ' '
01063      end if
01064   end do
01065 
01066 end subroutine xml_remove_tabs_
01067 
01068 end module xmlparse
